MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G62 postcode area of Glasgow, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:41am. Our engineers have arrived onsite. And our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45am. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:54 AM on Wednesday, 17 February 2021.
